titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Independent Agencies, Asset Proceeds and Space Management Fund for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Independent Agencies, Asset Proceeds and Space Management Fund for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: This bill limits FY2024 funding for the Asset Proceeds and Space Management Fund.
